title: Aim Constraint
description: A constraint that rotates the node to face sources.

source.description: The index of the node constrains the node.

sourceSpace.description: The source node will be evaluated in this space.

destinationSpace.description: The destination node will be evaluated in this space.

aimVector.description: An axis which faces the direction of its sources.

upVector.description: An up axis of the constraint.

freezeAxes.description: Axes be constrained by this constraint, in Yaw-Pitch order.
